name: Edmonton.py
body:
## Welcome to the Edmonton Python Meetup Group
Our next meeting is on August 12, 2013 at 6:30pm in the [Startup Edmonton] [1] offices ([#301, 10359-104 St, Edmonton, AB] [6]) and will feature three talks:

* A basic-/intermediate-level talk.
* A lightning talk.
* Python performance profiling by Daniel Nephin.

Our [last meeting] [2] featured three talks:

* An introduction to test-driven development by Stephen Semeniuk.
* A lightning talk on itertools by Daniel Nephin.
* A guide to Unicode by [Aden Grue] [8].

## About Us

Inspired by the community we saw at PyCon, we hope to foster a strong, supportive, and proficient Python community in the Edmonton area.

We meet on the second Monday of each month to listen to presentations and discuss Python news and events. Anyone interested in any aspect of Python development is welcome to join.

## Past Presentations
Wherever possible, code and slides from past presentations is made available on our [presentations archive page] [2].

## Contact

You can contact us at info@EdmontonPy.com or follow us on [Twitter] [4], [Meetup.com] [9], or [Facebook] [5].

[2]: http://EdmontonPy.com/presentations             "Edmonton.py Presentations"
[3]: https://www.facebook.com/events/148673168640825 "Next Meeting"
[4]: https://twitter.com/EdmontonPy                  "Edmonton.py on Twitter"
